author: dapplion

author: plasmapower
content: Any idea why calling `eth_maxPriorityFeePerGas` on Goerli is returning 6 wei right now? This seems to be happening across multiple RPC providers and a local geth node, but transactions with a 6 wei tip aren't going through.

author: lightclient
content: do you have a pending tx hash you can point to?

author: plasmapower
content: This was from the Arbitrum batch poster which is now running at a minimum 0.05 gwei tip, so unfortunately it isn't pending any more.

author: plasmapower
content: A pending tx from the time was 0xfd15d13e32c838316faea6ceffbbde809cd5ba7e9cdcf255d9e2d4b130a6d3af

author: plasmapower
content: should txs be going through with a 6 wei tip? it's possible there was something else going on, but increasing the tip definitely seemed to fix it
